anotherPlayerBlocked: You can't do this because {{username}} currently has a pending action ({{reasons}})!

blockedContext.acceptItem: choice to keep an item or not
blockedContext.cartSmallEvent: Choice to get in the cart or not
blockedContext.cooldown: You are typing commands too fast!
blockedContext.drink: choice of whether to drink a potion
blockedContext.fightConfirmation: choice of whether or not to start a fight
blockedContext.fightPetChoose: choice of an action for the pet fight event
blockedContext.guildShopConfirmation: confirmation of a choice in the guild's shop
blockedContext.missionShopConfirmation: confirmation of a choince in the missions shop
blockedContext.shopConfirmation: confirmation of a choice in the shop

interactionNotForYou: This interaction is not intended for you!
playerBlocked: You can't do this because you currently have a pending action ({{reasons}})!
playerDoesntExist: The requested player hasn't started playing yet !
guildAlreadyExist: The name you chose is already used by another guild.
guildNameNotValid:
The rules to naming a guild are as follows:
$t(error:stringRules)
alreadyInAGuild: You already belong to a guild.
pleaseWaitForHeal:
Please wait for the state alteration recovery to be complete before you can continue playing: {{time}}

{emote:messages.info} You can use the {command:shop} command to purchase a treatment.
pleaseWaitForHisHeal: Please wait until his state alteration recovery is complete: {{time}}
notEnoughMoney: You don't have enough money to perform this action. You are missing {{money}}{emote:unitValues.money}.
cooldownPetFree: You can only release one pet per hour. You will be able to release another one {{remainingTime}}.
petNickNotValid:
The rules for naming a pet are as follows:
$t(error:stringRules)
guildDescriptionNotValid:
The rules for describing a guild are as follows:
$t(error:stringRules)
stringRules:
- Use at least one letter
- Do not put more than 2 consecutive spaces
- Special characters are not allowed
- Between {{min}} and {{max}} characters
notInAGuild: You must belong to a guild to place this order.
notAuthorizedError: You do not have the required permissions to do that command in your guild, please ask a superior if needed.
levelTooLow: You must be **level {{level}}** to use this command! Come back later!
targetLevelTooLow: This player must be **level {{level}}** for you to use this command!
notAuthorizedRight: You do not have the required permissions to perform this command.
notPossibleWithoutStatus: You don't need our services right now

notStartedHint.self: Use the {command:report} command to start your adventure!

deadHint.self: You can revive by using the {command:respawn} command to continue playing.

errorOccurred:
An error occurred while executing this command :(

Please report this issue to a team member, specifying the time and server on which you encountered this problem.

Please do not hesitate to join our support server for help: https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ
maintenance:
The game is currently under maintenance, please try again later.

For more information, go to the official Discord server: https://discord.gg/AP3Wmzb
banned: You have been banned from the game.
aDevMessedUp: Oops! An error has occurred. Don't worry, it's not your fault. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience. To resolve this problem, please contact our support team via our Discord server: https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ
commandNotAvailableHere: This command cannot be used at this location.
guildFoodStorageFull: You have received **{{quantity}}x {{food}}**, but your guild's food stock is full. The food has been thrown away.
fightBugged: The battle was cancelled because there was a technical problem. This is due to the deletion of a message necessary for combat or a permission issue.
resetIsNow: {emote:announcements.trophy} The weekly ranking is currently being reset. The winner will soon be announced on the bot's server! The game will resume in less than 5 minutes!
seasonEndIsNow: {emote:unitValues.glory} The fighting season is being reset! The winner will be announced shortly on the bot's server! The game will resume in less than 20 minutes!
